front.title: •Bossk's Mortar Gun
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on Bossk, 4 on any other warrior. May fire using 2 Force. Draw destiny. If destiny > 0, one card with that destiny number at same site is lost (your choice). If destiny = 0, mortar gun explodes and warrior firing it is lost.
front.lore: Relby-v10 micro grenade launcher. Modified version of the limited range CSPL 'Caspel' Projectile Launcher. Blows lots of stuff up.

rulings: Counts as 'targeting a character with a weapon' and so is countered by e.g. Blaster Deflection.
May not target inactive cards or owner's cards.
